Description:
Detects scenarios where an attacker enables the OpenSSH server and server starts to listening on SSH socket.

Author: mdecrevoisier
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: OpenSSH Server Listening On Socket
Query: sourcetype='windows-openssh' eql select * from _source_ where eventid = '4' and process = 'sshd' and payload like 'server listening on %'
